name: Global Research Conference On Infrastructure and Civil Engineering
content: We, the Foster Research Organization, are hosting the “Global Research Conference on Infrastructure and Civil Engineering” (GRCICE2024), which is scheduled to take place on October 24-26, 2024 in Barcelona, Spain. The theme of the conference is “To emphasize the importance of creating sustainable infrastructure that will improve the global environment and strategies to build a better world and have a positive impact on society”. The central aim of the conference is to provide a platform for networking and collaboration, facilitating meaningful exchanges among professionals from different disciplines and backgrounds. The conference will focus on existing and future obstacles and how to overcome them through insightful discussions and by knowledge-sharing sessions, as well as providing information about novel advancements in the field of infrastructure and civil engineering.
